parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The ID of the primary account of the Resource Directory member account.
> call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) interface to obtain this parameter.

parameters.name: StatisticTypes
parameters.description: An array that consists of the details of a statistical type.

parameters.name: TimeEnd
parameters.description: The timestamp that specifies the end of the time range to collect statistics. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: TimeStart
parameters.description: The timestamp that specifies the beginning of the time range to collect statistics. Unit: milliseconds.
